description: This demo automatically triggers for specific GUIDs

conversation_flow.agent_response: Welcome! This demo is automatically triggered for your GUID. No matter what you type, you'll get responses from this demo.
I can demonstrate various features! Since your GUID is configured for auto-demo mode, this conversation will always use this scripted demo flow.
The ScriptedDemoAgent checks each demo file for an 'auto_trigger_guids' array. If your GUID matches, the demo triggers automatically - regardless of what you type!
You can add any GUIDs to the 'auto_trigger_guids' array in your demo JSON file. Multiple demos can have different GUIDs configured.
You're welcome! To use this feature, just add your GUID to the 'auto_trigger_guids' array in any demo JSON file in Azure File Storage.
